q: On January 29, looters swarmed into the archaeological site of Saqqara, an ancient burial ground known for its pyramids and many surrounding tombs. Reports circulated about damage to the tombs and their beautiful reliefs. All the sites are safe, said Minister of Antiquities Zahi Hawass .`` Nothing stolen, nothing destroyed.'' With Zahi Hawass ' permission, veteran foreign correspondent Jeffrey Bartholet, on assignment for National Geographic magazine, was able to visit Saqqara, some

'' he said.`` Larry Page , Sergey Brin and I have worked exceptionally closely together for over a decade-- and we anticipate working together for a long time to come.'' Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt for an outstanding job leading Google for the last decade.`` There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, he said.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him. His advice and efforts will be invaluable to me as I start in this new role,'' he said

The La Mesa Republican Monday said his Senate Bill Lockyer 120 would force the state to accept registered warrants as payment for taxes or fees. IOUs could be a death knell for already struggling California businesses, Joel Anderson said in a statement.
